A natural sedative designed to promote relaxation and restful sleep. The mixture is based on ingredients such as valerian root, passionflower, hop cones, and chamomile. We all know Valerian as the #1 remedy for insomnia. It has not only a calming, but in some cases also an analgesic effect - for tension headaches. The benefits of taking Valerian and Passionflower together will not only help improve sleep, but this duet also very gently helps with panic attacks. Hop cones and Baikal skullcap are also excellent natural remedies for normalizing sleep, relieving anxiety and tension. This is not the first time I have taken this drug. Alternating with Sleep Blend SP-17, from the same Solaray. They have similar compositions, the same number of capsules in the package and the same price for them. I would also like to note that the packaging is very nice and beautiful.
